nodes.bodyText:
In the middle of the 1.9 or 1.10 lifecycle
Tridents were added in 1.13 so we don't need a backport for 1.8
@md678685 Looking through various API revisions, it looks like this dates as far back as at least 1.9.4 (source).
Is there an equivalent for 1.8.8 to limit picking up arrows? If not, this isn't a blocker.
I added 1.8.8 support, tested and works.
